item.description:
This is a great chance to hang out at the Funky Monkey on a Springtime Friday evening and enjoy some wonderful music by the Sawtelles.  You can check them out here:

http://thesawtelles.com/

The Funky Monkey advertisement for the event states:

Friday, May 13, 5:30-7:30 PM:  Happy Hour on the Courtyard w/ The Sawtelles, complimentary appetizers & drink specials

And the Funky Monkey Website:

http://thefunkymonkeycafe.com/

As many of you know, Funky Monkey has great coffee, food, wine, beer...and Tracey is a great host!

I went to the opening reception for the current artist on display, Florin Ion Firimita.  A native of Romania who immigrated in 1990, he is a former Department of Education Arts Advisor and current University of CT professor.  I thought his work, inspired by a close friend's struggle with cancer was gorgeous and really worth seeing.  Lovely mixed media:

http://www.florinfirimita.com/

This is a striking work from the collection that you will see:

http://www.florinfirimita.com/large-view/Mixed+Media/110035-3-0-8987/Mixed%20Media/Representational.html
item.why: The Funky Monkey is fun, the Sawtelles are awesome, and the weather might be lovely...
item.name: Funky Monkey Happy Hour with the Sawtelles
